name: Igloo Games Arcade
description:
Where other guys give you a new level in an update Igloo Games gives you a brand new GAME! For free!
Enjoy Leap Worm an out-of-this-world planet-orbiting, star-collecting, enemy-bashing, mission-completing super all-new game!
5 AMAZING GAMES IN 1 SLICK PACKAGE!
AND... It's Universal! - Play on iPad, iPhone or iPod touch!

-------------------------------

HIGHLIGHTS:

• 5 HIGHLY RATED GAMES
Dizzy Bee, Dizzy Bee 2, Bed Bugs Flippin', and the brand new Leap Worm!

• USER LISTS
Create personal profiles so each player can have their own progress.

• HIGH-RES GRAPHICS
All games look gorgeous, especially on the iPad and retina displays!

• DUAL USER MODE [iPad]
Share the iPad. Split the screen and play 2 different games at the same time… that's right… AT THE SAME TIME!!

• 2 PLAYER MODE [iPad]
Want to play together? In 2 player mode you can play against or with each other.

GAME DESCRIPTIONS

• DIZZY BEE
Guide Dizzy Bee and help him save his friends by tilting and turning the device. Lead friends to safety while avoid baddies and collecting flowers. Unique gameplay, fun art style and clever challenges await you.

• DIZZY BEE 2
Dizzy Bee in an all-new adventure. Meet baddies you've never seen! Can you help your Fruit Friends make their way through grinding gears, around sticky webs and past wild turrets?

- 120+ levels including Easy & Hard variations and Bonus Stages.
- Power ups! No longer are you defenseless. The good guys strike back.  

• BED BUGS
Night falls and our sleepwalker, deep in sleep, ups and takes a stroll through dreamscapes filled with creepy crawly bed bugs. To protect him, use multi-touch to squash Bed Bugs and keep the sleepwalker safe. Hold one bug while you tap another, and flick a third, but be careful not to get your fingers tied up in knots! Each bed bug requires a special technique to exterminate. Can you figure them all out?

- 28 unique enemies
- Gorgeous dreamscapes
- Beautiful bug splat animations

• FLIPPIN'
Igloo Games' take on match 3 gaming. Crazy-fun!
Flip and slide your way to action puzzle bliss. Whether you want relaxed-but-tricky puzzles, computer opponents or endless tiles raining down - Flippin' has you covered! Flippin' uses a board made of double sided tiles. You can flip a tile so what was on your side is now on the far side and vice versa. Flip pieces to get 3 like symbols on your side horizontally or vertically and they will go away and give you points. A tutorial mode quickly teaches you the rules as you play.

• LEAP WORM
In Leap Worm you control a space worm through several different mission types throughout several different galaxies. Jump from planet to planet collecting stars, blue mystery orbs and more. Encounter many different aliens all trying to block your progress. Can you figure out the tricks to defeating them? Simple one button gameplay is quick to pick up, but you'll be amazed at the intriguing gameplay. From Kids mode to Hard mode we have you covered. Get medals, discover ice, fuzzy-slow, crumble, disappearing, spike, and floating bubble planets. Can you unlock the secret character and find the hidden planets?
